entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 16.

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023
